mapper.insert:
insert into contract_source (plan_id, plan_contract_id, certificate_type, certificate_image_url, certificate_status, notes, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id, enable ) values
(#{item.planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.planContractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.certificateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.certificateImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.enable,jdbcType=BIT} )
